rules.description: Neo2 layers (Apple keyboards). Rule applied to Apple keyboards only.
Neo2 layers (Mac keyboards). Rule applied to third party Mac keyboards. Can be used together with the Apple keyboard rule or alone.
Neo2 layers (PC keyboards). Rule applied to PC keyboards only. Can't be used with the other Mac Neo2 layer rule together, but can be used with the Apple keyboard rule or alone.
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Tab acts as Ctrl if pressed with another key
Neo2 mod 4: Map  to Home and  to End in terminal apps, remote desktop apps and virtual machines.  (move this rule above other Neo2 rules).
